title: Netflix is NOT giving free subscription to people in isolation due to Coronavirus outbreak | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid Coronavirus outbreak, a website link is being shared along with a message claiming that Netflix is giving ‘access to its platform of films and series for the period of isolation’.

“Netflix decided to grant access to its platform of films and series for the period of isolation, but it is for a short time the registration! Run on the site!

ALSO READ: PM Modi is NOT declaring Emergency under Article 360; don’t believe…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above message and found that it is a spam.

When we open the site, we were asked to answer some questions related to COVID-19. following which they asked us to share the link with ’10 friend’ to activate the subscription. We also noted that this website is not a secure site.

NewsMobile also contacted a senior Netflix official who confirmed that the above site is FAKE and Netflix is NOT giving a free subscription.

This proves that the viral link is spam and no such schemes have been announced by the streaming service.
